nodes.text: Thaelos were a race of primates native to the many forested craters of Saleucami.

A predatory race of primates, thaelos lived in the jungle trees common to Saleucami's many craters. Excellent climbers, they could move with a speed and grace which belied their bulk. Hunting in family groups known as a pride, they were known to bring down creatures double their size. Capable of moving on two legs, thaelos were much faster when utilizing their long arms for support.
